channel.title: Repeated crashings
channel.description: Hi, my game has been crashing constantly for a while. At first it would only happen sometimes while loading, which i could ignore, but since i launched the rocket, it's been happening basically every five minutes. It's becoming a huge problem and it's making the game almost impossible to play. there's no real pattern either, i'll just be playing like normal when suddenly the game stops working and i have to use task manager to force quit it. Please help!

item.title: Repeated crashings
item.dc:creator: Demmitri
item.description:
Same issue. I dont its gonna be fixed soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Repeated crashings

item.description:
Sorry for double posting but at this point it is literally crashing after three minutes of gameplay, please help!

Read full topic

item.title: Repeated crashings
item.dc:creator: Wusodoolo
item.description:
Hi, my game has been crashing constantly for a while. At first it would only happen sometimes while loading, which i could ignore, but since i launched the rocket, it’s been happening basically every five minutes. It’s becoming a huge problem and it’s making the game almost impossible to play. there’s no real pattern either, i’ll just be playing like normal when suddenly the game stops working and i have to use task manager to force quit it. Please help!
